query:
UPDATE "users"
            SET email = coalesce($1, "users".email),
                username = coalesce($2, "users".username),
                bio = coalesce($3, "users".bio),
                password_hash = coalesce($4, "users".password_hash),
                image = coalesce($5, "users".image)
            WHERE user_id = $6
            returning email, username, bio, image
